title: Head’s up
author: VD
content_html: I have seen the future… and it contains both Preview and Quotes. Both features work rather nicely; the carriage-return-inside-tags issue has been fixed as well. I made a few minor recommendations that they’re in the process of implementing, so you should be able to take the new-and-improved version out for a whirl tomorrow.
content_text:
I have seen the future… and it contains both Preview
and
Quotes.  Both features work rather nicely; the carriage-return-inside-tags issue has been fixed as well.  I made a few minor recommendations that they’re in the process of implementing, so you should be able to take the new-and-improved version out for a whirl tomorrow.
